So there are two codes here. The subroutine monitors when you die, and will automatically respawn for you. The subroutine also will prevent the mission from failing. The other code enables respawn in single player since the functions are normally only called when playing online.
*needs to be ported*

Enable Respawn Offline
2055205C 00000000

Auto Respawn
202CED04 0802E424
200B9090 27BDFFD0
200B9094 FFBF0030
200B9098 3C010069
200B909C 7FB20020
200B90A0 7FB10010
200B90A4 7FB00000
200B90A8 A0204D70
200B90AC 0C0ACD60
200B90B0 00000000
200B90B4 0040802D
200B90B8 12000015
200B90BC 00000000
200B90C0 3C010043
200B90C4 8C317DC8
200B90C8 82310004
200B90CC 12200003
200B90D0 00000000
200B90D4 1000000E
200B90D8 00000000
200B90DC 24020001
200B90E0 A2220004
200B90E4 3C01000C
200B90E8 8C329060
200B90EC 24030050
200B90F0 16430005
200B90F4 00000000
200B90F8 A2020FCF
200B90FC AC209060
200B9100 10000003
200B9104 00000000
200B9108 26520001
200B910C AC329060
200B9110 DFBF0030
200B9114 7BB20020
200B9118 7BB10010
200B911C 7BB00000

200B9124 27BD0030
